sections.heading: Operational Snapshot
sections.content:
Daily digest of official releases touching Scottish and wider UK aviation activity:
- **Wick - Aberdeen PSO Procurement Process Launched** — Highland Council have launched an emergency tender today to secure a new operator the Wick - Aberdeen PSO service.
- **Update on flights at Wick John O'Groats Airport** — The Highland Council have provided an update on the suspension of flights between Wick and Aberdeen by Eastern Airways.
- **Update for Wick John O'Groats Airport** — HIAL was made aware via press coverage that Eastern Airways has filed for administration.
